title: Profile Counters Extension
description: Holds a map of objects containing counter_value and counter_expiry, keyed by counter_id.

xdm:frequencyMap.description: A map from counter_id to objects containing counter_value, counter_expiry

xdm:value.title: Profile Counter Value
xdm:value.description: Represents the latest value of the Profile Counter after being Incremented.

xdm:expiry.title: Profile Counter Expiry
xdm:expiry.description: Represents the TTL for the Profile Counter.
